name: aperiodic-codes
description: Classical aperiodic codes used for generating fractonic quantum codes
author: Rosetta-Tan

scripts.start: rm -rf dist && parcel index.html alpha/**/index.html standard/**/index.html beta/**/index.html --no-cache -p 1234 --open
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && parcel build index.html alpha/**/index.html standard/**/index.html beta/**/index.html --no-source-maps --no-cache --public-url /canvas-magic
